dublin_core.dcvalue: We searched the National Research Register NRR to identify funded research in Scotland or in collaboration with a Scottish partner in the area of implementation and evaluation of e health services A total of 61 research projects were identified which had been funded since 1 January 1995 These projects shared almost 7 million pound of funding 1 pound is 1 9 or 1 3 euro the main funding sources being the Scottish Government and the European Union Based on the projects reviewed the majority of e health research in Scotland was being conducted within the communication systems domain Most of the research was being conducted at a single centre only 14 studies 23 were multisite Future collaboration between these researchers involving larger scale funding bids may increase the quantity of e health implementation and evaluation research
E-health: implementation and evaluation research in Scotland -- a scoping exercise.
